title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeOverview: Ghosh arrives with a search warrant on the wedding day. Lucky manages to get Rishi, Koyal, and Praful out of the doghouse just in time. But, someone is on their trail. An angry Teji lashes out at Daman and the wedding comes to an abrupt halt.
